(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Just) (RB recently))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD watched)
        (NP (`` ``)
          (NP (NNP Hunger) (NNPS Games))
          ('' '')
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS movies)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD came)
        (PRT (RP away))
        (NP (NN sicken))
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP (DT the) (NN fact)))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT a) (NN society))
            (VP (MD would)
              (VP (VB resort)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG sacrificing)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS children))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NN order))
                          (PP (IN save)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN peace))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(recently-2, Just-1)
advmod(watched-4, recently-2)
nsubj(watched-4, I-3)
root(ROOT-0, watched-4)
nn(Games-7, Hunger-6)
dobj(watched-4, Games-7)
prep(Games-7, at-9)
det(movies-11, the-10)
pobj(at-9, movies-11)
cc(watched-4, and-12)
conj(watched-4, came-13)
prt(came-13, away-14)
dobj(came-13, sicken-15)
prep(came-13, by-16)
det(fact-18, the-17)
pobj(by-16, fact-18)
mark(resort-23, that-19)
det(society-21, a-20)
nsubj(resort-23, society-21)
aux(resort-23, would-22)
ccomp(came-13, resort-23)
prep(resort-23, to-24)
pcomp(to-24, sacrificing-25)
poss(children-27, their-26)
dobj(sacrificing-25, children-27)
prep(sacrificing-25, in-28)
pobj(in-28, order-29)
prep(order-29, save-30)
det(peace-32, the-31)
pobj(save-30, peace-32)

  (PP (IN In)
    (NP
      (NP (NN case))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP have) (RB not)
            (VP (VBN seen)
              (NP (DT the) (NN show))))
          (, ,))))))

    (VP (VBZ is)

    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (NP
        (NP (CD 13) (NNS colonies))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT a) (NN country) (NN call) (NN Panem)))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBN rebelled)
              (PP (IN against)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ powerful) (NN ruling) (NN Capitol))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBD plunged)
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN country))
                        (PP (IN into)
                          (NP (DT a) (JJ devastating) (JJ civil) (NN war)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP King) (NNP Minos))
      (VP (VBD had)
        (VP (VBN sent)
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NN army)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB attack)
                  (NP (NNP Athens)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT the) (NN end)))
      (NP (DT a) (NN peace) (NN treaty))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (VP (VBN struck)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNP The) (NNP King))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Athens))))
              (VP (MD would)
                (VP (VB offer)
                  (NP
                    (NP (CD 7) (NNS boys))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP (CD 7) (NNS girls)))
                  (PP (TO to)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP King) (NNP Minos))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NNP Crete)))))
                  (SBAR (IN once)
                    (S
                      (NP (DT every) (CD nine) (NNS years))
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB be)
                          (VP (VBN fed)
                            (PP (TO to)
                              (NP
                                (NP (DT the) (NN Minotaur))
                                (PP (IN in)
                                  (NP (NN return)))))
                            (PP (IN for)
                              (S (RB not)
                                (VP (VBG sending)
                                  (NP (PRP$ his) (NN army)
                                    (S
                                      (VP (TO to)
                                        (VP (VB attack)
                                          (NP (NNP Athens)))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB get)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN sense))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN sacrifice))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNS thousands))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (JJ young) (NNS men))))))))))
    (, ,)))

            (NP (JJ German) (NNS bullets)))))

                (NN liberty))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN written)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN book))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Leviticus)))))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT this) (NN practice))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB expressly))
              (VP (VBN forbidden)
                (PP (IN by)
                  (NP (NNP God)))))))))
    (. .)))

              (NP

                  (NP (NNP Isaac)))))))))

(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ clear))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN purpose))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ his) (NN being))
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (NN earth))))))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP
                  (VP (VB live)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ sinless) (NN life)))
                  (CC and)
                  (VP (VB die)
                    (PP (IN as)

                        (NP (PRP$ our) (NN substitute))
                        (PP (IN on)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN cross)))))))))))))
    (. .)))
